Reviews.Title: beautiful picture
Reviews.Author: alfern
Reviews.Content: great camera, the picture is so clear it looks like its in hd.  I will continue to purchase this product.

ProductInfo.Name: (8) Pack of Professional 1/3" Sony Effio CCD 700TVL Outdoor Surveillance Video Security Camera with Power Supply Kit - 700 TV Lines, 3.6mm Wide Angle Lens, 26pcs IR LED, OSD Menu, WDR (Wide Dynamic Range)
